special_text:
[i](Choose only one work as a sorcery to add its ability.)[/i]
When Seto’s Private Collection enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.     
{1}{R}: [i]Bloodline[/i]
Attacking creatures you control have first strike.
{2}{W}: [i]Hope’s Savior[/i]
Attacking creatures you control have lifelink.
